testcase.name: User can checkout product some variant successfuly - #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the login page.............................................passed When User logged in with "standard_user" and "secret_sauce".................passed Then User is navigated to the product page..................................passed When User adds a product to the cart "Sauce Labs Backpack"..................passed And User clicks on the cart icon............................................passed Then User verify the product is added to cart "Sauce Labs Backpack".........passed When User clicks on the checkout button.....................................passed Then User is navigated to the checkout page.................................passed When User fills in the checkout information with valid data.................passed Then User verify the selected product in the overview list "Sauce Labs Backpack".passed When User clicks on the finish button.......................................passed Then User should see the order confirmation page............................passed
